definitions.definition: point or direct (a weapon or camera) at a target.
examples: aim the camcorder at some suitable object

definitions.definition: direct (an object or blow) at someone or something.
examples: she had aimed the bottle at his head
synonyms: draw a bead on "she aimed at the target"

definitions.definition: direct information or an action toward (a particular group).
examples: the TV campaign is aimed at the 16-24 age group
synonyms: pitch to/at "this system is aimed at the home entertainment market"

examples: new French cooking aims at producing clear, fresh flavors and light textures
synonyms: endeavor to achieve; Moreformalessay for "undergraduates aiming for a degree"intend
design "we aim to give you the best possible service"
